title: Life of a Philippine family
brief_description: An account of family life in a rural area of the Philippines. The family is that of Carlos, a rice farmer, his wife and two children. Observes Carlos at work in his rice field, his wife shopping and preparing meals for the family, the children as they go to school and assist their parents.
